|{{HistoryLine||1.0.0|dev=Beta 1.9 Prerelease|Nether wart has an extra, unobtainable item form corresponding to its block ID. It can be obtained via inventory editors with numeric item ID 115.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.2.5|dev=pre|Nether wart items can now be obtained via Pick Block in creative.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.3.1|dev=12w16a|Nether wart items can now be obtained in singleplayer worlds via the {{cmd|give}} command using the respective numeric ID.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.7.2|dev=13w37a|The direct item form of Nether wart has been removed from the game. It can no longer exist as an item in any way, only as a placed block.}}
|{{HistoryLine|pocket alpha}}
|{{HistoryLine||v0.12.1|dev=build 1|Nether wart has an extra, unobtainable item form corresponding to its block ID. It can be obtained via inventory editors with numeric item ID 115.}}
